item.title: ‘Santa Claus rally’ begins — but will the stock market avoid a ‘Grinch pinch’?
item.description: Remember: ‘If Santa Claus should fail to call, bears may come to Broad and Wall.’

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Higher
item.description: Gold settled 0.7% higher, up for a second consecutive session, and silver rose 0.2%, up for four consecutive sessions.

item.title: Biden’s gift to Trump: Golden opportunity to supercharge the economy
item.description: Dismantling Biden’s industrial policies would greatly harm U.S. economic growth.

item.title: Dow Industrials Steady; Bond Yields Grind Higher
item.description: Major indexes traded lower in their first post-Christmas Day session, while a recent bond-market selloff deepened.

item.title: Palantir’s most bullish analyst sees stock falling nearly 10%
item.description: Based on stock price targets, the most bullish analyst on Palantir’s stock could be considered by some to actually be bearish.
